title: Web Design Principles
para: Proficiency in the fundamental principles of design, such as layout, color theory, typography, and visual hierarchy.

title: Website Design
para: Ability to create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.

title: User Experience (UX) Design
para: Understanding of user behavior and psychology to design seamless and enjoyable enjoyable user experiences.

title: Wireframing and Prototyping
para: Ability to create wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize and test website layouts website layouts and functionality.

title: Mobile-Friendly Optimization
para: Knowledge of techniques to optimize websites for mobile devices, ensuring a smooth user experience on smaller screens.

title: Custom Development
para: Knowledge of techniques to optimize websites for mobile devices, ensuring a smooth user experience on smaller screens.
